name: Hang on to Humanity
text: Give to the Narya Player. You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose: . Exhaust Narya -> remove Hang on to Humanity from the game. . Place 2 permanence counters on your faceup creature form. Discard this obligation.

name: Master of the World
text: Drone minions get +1 SCH, +1 ATK and +1 hit points. master of the world gets +1 ATK for each acceleration token in play. Forced Interrupt: When Master fo the world attacks, resolve his attack aganst each ALPHA FLIGHT character. (ALPHA FLIGHT nemesis minion.)

name: Drone Master
text: Permanent. Forced Response: After your turn ends, if there is 1 or more threat here, resolve the "Drone Master" ability. Drone Master - Special: Discard te top 2 cards of the encounter deck. put each trachery discarded this way into play facedown, engaged with you as a drone minion. Each facedown encounter card Drone minon has base hit points of 1, base SCH of 0, base attack of 0 and the AERIAL trait.

name: Alpha Drone
text: DRONE minons gain ranged. When Revealed: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. When defeated: Resolve the "Drone Master" ability. * Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

name: Gravity Displacement
text: AERIAL characters get -1 ATK and -1 DEF. Ranged attacks deal 1 additional damage. Action: Discard 2 cards from you hand and the top 5 cards of the encounter deck -> draw 2 cards. If the combined cost of those cards is 3 or more, discard this card. * Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.

name: Increasing Drones
text: Each DRONE minion gets +1 ATK and gains toughness and retaliate 1. Hero Response: After you defeat a DRONE minion, spend 2 [per_player] resources -> discard this card. * Boost: Place 3 threat on the Drone Master side scheme.
